select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.checks_no , t1.plan_name , t1.generate_by , t1.generate_date , t1.implementation_department , t1.checks_number , t1.telephone , t1.next_regular_start_date , t1.next_regular_end_date , t1.attachment from assets_device_rcheck_proc t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')

and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and t1.CHECKS_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.checksNo}),'%')
and t1.PLAN_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.planName}),'%')
and t1.GENERATE_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.generateBy}),'%')
and t1.GENERATE_DATE >= #{bean.generateDateBegin}
and t1.GENERATE_DATE <= #{bean.generateDateEnd}
and t1.IMPLEMENTATION_DEPARTMENT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.implementationDepartment}),'%')
and t1.CHECKS_NUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.checksNumber}),'%')

and t1.NEXT_REGULAR_START_DATE <= #{bean.nextRegularStartDateEnd}
and t1.NEXT_REGULAR_END_DATE >= #{bean.nextRegularEndDateBegin}
and t1.NEXT_REGULAR_END_DATE <= #{bean.nextRegularEndDateEnd}
and t1.ATTACHMENT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attachment}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc
